name: HTML Agent
description: Examples of user prompts that require the HTML agent.

examples.prompt: Make an app that is a todo list for all my needs
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Create a web app that is a to-do list. It should have features for adding, editing, and deleting tasks. It should also allow users to categorize tasks and set deadlines. Make sure the app is easy to use and visually appealing.

examples.prompt:
Current Script: To-Do List App
That's great, but I need it to be more like a calendar
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Modify the web app to function more like a calendar. It should allow users to view tasks by day, week, or month. Users should be able to set reminders for tasks and view upcoming deadlines. Make sure the app is easy to use and visually appealing.

examples.prompt: Can we make an app together that incorporates the history of the world in a timeline?
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Create a web app that displays a timeline of world history. Users should be able to navigate through different time periods and view key events. The app should include images, videos, and descriptions for each event. Make sure the app is easy to use and visually appealing.

examples.prompt:
Current Script: History of the World App
Can you fix the app so that it works on mobile devices?
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Optimize the web app for mobile devices. It should be responsive and work well on both smartphones and tablets. Make sure the app is easy to use and visually appealing on all screen sizes.

examples.prompt:
Current Script: To-Do List App
There is a bug on this one... When I press save nothing happens.
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Fix the bug in the web app that prevents users from saving tasks. The save button should trigger the appropriate action and update the task list. Make sure the app is easy to use and visually appealing.

examples.prompt: I need an app that allows me to create a resume and export it to PDF
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Create a web app that helps users create a resume. It should have templates for different types of resumes and allow users to customize the content. The app should also have an option to export the resume to PDF. Make sure the app is easy to use and visually appealing and works well on all devices.

examples.prompt:
Current Script: Resume Builder App
There are a few things wrong with it. Can you add the ability to change fonts and colors?
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Add customization options to the web app that allow users to change fonts and colors. Users should be able to select from a variety of fonts and colors for different sections of the resume. Make sure the app is easy to use and visually appealing.

examples.prompt: I need an app that can help me track my expenses and create reports
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Create a web app that helps users track expenses and generate reports. It should allow users to categorize expenses, set budgets, and view spending trends. The app should also have features for generating detailed reports and visualizing data. Make sure the app is easy to use and visually appealing.

examples.prompt:
Current Script: Expense Tracker App
I need to be able to import data from my bank account
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Add a feature to the web app that allows users to import data from their bank account. Users should be able to connect their bank account and automatically import transactions. Make sure the app is secure and easy to use.

examples.prompt: Can you create an app that helps me learn a new language?
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Create a web app that helps users learn a new language. It should have features for practicing vocabulary, grammar, and pronunciation. The app should also include quizzes, games, and interactive lessons. Make sure the app is easy to use and visually appealing.

examples.prompt: I need a personal portfolio website for my job search as a graphic designer
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Create a professional portfolio website for a graphic designer. It should showcase the designer's work in a visually appealing gallery, include an about section, contact information, and resume/CV. The site should have a modern, sleek design with smooth animations and be responsive across all devices.

examples.prompt: Create a recipe book app where I can save and organize my favorite recipes
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Create a web app for saving and organizing recipes. It should allow users to create, edit, and categorize recipes. Include features like search functionality, ingredient lists, preparation steps, cooking time, and the ability to scale recipes. Add a feature to create meal plans and shopping lists based on selected recipes.

examples.prompt:
Current Script: Recipe Book App
Can you add a feature to share recipes with friends via email?
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Add a sharing feature to the recipe app that allows users to share recipes with friends via email. Include options to customize the message, select multiple recipes to share, and preview how the shared recipe will look. Make sure the feature is intuitive and easy to use.

examples.prompt: I want an interactive map app that shows hiking trails near me
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Create a web app that displays hiking trails on an interactive map. It should use geolocation to show trails near the user's location, provide details about trail difficulty, length, elevation gain, and user reviews. Include features to filter trails by difficulty, length, and rating, and allow users to save favorite trails.

examples.prompt:
Current Script: Hiking Trails App
The map isn't loading correctly on Firefox. Can you fix it?
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Fix the compatibility issue that prevents the map from loading correctly in Firefox. Ensure that the application works consistently across all major browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Test and optimize the map functionality specifically for Firefox.

examples.prompt: Build a simple music player that can play local audio files
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Create a web-based music player that can play local audio files. It should have features for play, pause, skip, and volume control. Include a playlist functionality where users can organize their music, display album art and track information, and implement a responsive design that works well on desktop and mobile devices.

examples.prompt:
Current Script: Music Player App
Can we add a visualizer that responds to the music?
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Add an audio visualizer to the music player that responds to the music being played. The visualizer should analyze the audio frequencies and display dynamic, animated visual effects that sync with the beat and tone of the music. Allow users to choose from different visualization styles and customize colors.

examples.prompt: Make a simple e-commerce website for a small clothing brand
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Create an e-commerce website for a small clothing brand. Include a product catalog with filtering options, individual product pages with details and images, a shopping cart, and a checkout process. Make the site responsive, visually appealing, and aligned with modern e-commerce best practices. Include features for product reviews, size guides, and related product suggestions.

examples.prompt:
Current Script: E-commerce Website
I need to add a discount code feature at checkout
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Add a discount code feature to the checkout process of the e-commerce website. Allow users to enter and apply discount codes that reduce the total price. Implement validation for discount codes, show clear feedback when codes are applied or invalid, and update the order total in real-time when discounts are applied.

examples.prompt: Create a countdown timer app for my workout routines
examples.response: <HTML_SCRIPT> Create a workout countdown timer app. It should allow users to set custom timers for different exercises, create and save workout routines with multiple timers, and include features like rest periods between exercises. Add audio alerts for timer completion and a visually clear interface that's easy to read during workouts.
